title: ollama/ollama
summary: Ollama’s official CLI and server for running Llama 2, Code Llama, and other LLMs locally with a single command.

title: langchain-ai/langchain (Ollama integration)
summary: First-class LangChain LLM and chat interface for Ollama, enabling Retrieval-Augmented Generation and agent workflows.

title: ollama-js on npm
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for the Ollama server; chat, generate, pull, and manage models from Node or browsers.

title: ollama-python on PyPI
summary: Official Python client library that wraps the Ollama REST API for chat, generate, embeddings, and model management.

title: ollama-webui (now Open WebUI)
summary: Feature-rich, self-hosted web interface for Ollama with chat history, RAG, and user management; works without internet.

title: ollama4j – Java client
summary: Lightweight Java/Kotlin SDK for chatting, generating, and pulling models from an Ollama server.

title: ollama-rb – Ruby gem
summary: Community Ruby gem providing idiomatic bindings to the Ollama API.

title: ollama-cli – Rust CLI
summary: Fast, cross-platform CLI written in Rust for chatting and managing Ollama models.

title: ollama-copilot – VS Code extension
summary: Bring local LLM power into VS Code with inline suggestions and chat sidebar powered by Ollama.

title: ollama-haystack integration
summary: Haystack component that uses Ollama models for generative question answering and summarization pipelines.

title: ollama-codex – GitHub Copilot-style plugin
summary: Neovim plugin providing AI code completions via Ollama with customizable model selection.

title: ollama-discord – Discord bot
summary: Self-hostable Discord bot that brings local LLM chat to any server using Ollama backends.

title: ollama-helm – Kubernetes Helm charts
summary: Production-ready Helm chart for deploying Ollama server and models on Kubernetes clusters.

title: ollama-dagger – CI module
summary: Dagger module that caches and serves Ollama models inside CI pipelines for reproducible LLM tests.

title: ollama-cookbook – Community recipes
summary: Curated collection of example scripts and notebooks showing RAG, fine-tuning, and agent patterns with Ollama.

title: reddit/r/ollama – Discussion hub
summary: Active subreddit for troubleshooting, model recommendations, and ecosystem announcements.

title: ollama-slack – Slack bot
summary: Slack bot that adds /ollama slash commands for private or channel-based LLM conversations.

title: ollama-streamlit – Chat UI template
summary: Minimal Streamlit app template for chatting with any Ollama model, including session memory and markdown rendering.
